__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on bugs that were tagged '''regression-potential''' during Intrepid's development! 

After you have improved a bug report put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20081106
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20081106

=== Goal ===

These bug reports were identified as possible regressions during the development of Intrepid.  Now that the final version of Intrepid is out we'll confirm that the bug still exists, update the tag to '''regression-release''' and gather any more needed information to ensure that the bug can be fixed in a Stable Release Update.

Every bug tagged '''regression-release''' should also contain the following template using package versions:

<pre>
=== Regression details ===
Discovered in version:
Last known good version:

</pre>
